text.name: sys_description
text.text: The V.Smile is a video game console released in 2004, designed by VTech. Designed for children aged 3 to 9 years old. The console offers 45 games derived from worlds known to children, such as Disney or Dora the Explorer. It has an original controller with 5 buttons and a joystick, in the shape of a dog's paw. Originally only available in orange and purple, it will later be released in pink and purple for girls. The V.Smile Pocket released in 2007, is a portable version of the console with a double touch screen and a microphone, like the Nintendo DS.
